item.text: __R__ is a [[programming language]] and [[Free software]] software environment for [[statistical computing]] and graphics supported by the R Foundation for Statistical Computing - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R_(programming_language) wikipedia]
[[Source code]] for the R software environment is written primarily in [[C (programming language)]], [[Fortran]] and [[Self-hosting]] and is freely available under the [[GNU General Public License]].

Pre-compiled binary versions are provided for various [[operating system]]s. Although R has a [[command line interface]], there are several [[graphical user interface]]s, such as [[RStudio]], an [[Integrated development environment]].

''[[The R Journal]]'' is the [[open access]], [[Academic journal]] journal of the R project for statistical computing. It features short to medium length articles on the use, and development of R, including packages, programming tips, CRAN news, and foundation news - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R_(programming_language)#R_Journal wikipedia]

[[The R Journal]] is the [[open access]], [[Academic journal]] journal of the R project for statistical computing. It features short to medium length articles on the use, and development of R, including packages, programming tips, CRAN news, and foundation news - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R_(programming_language)#R_Journal wikipedia]

story.text: __R__ is a [[programming language]] and [[Free software]] software environment for [[statistical computing]] and graphics supported by the R Foundation for Statistical Computing - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R_(programming_language) wikipedia]
[[Source code]] for the R software environment is written primarily in [[C (programming language)]], [[Fortran]] and [[Self-hosting]] and is freely available under the [[GNU General Public License]].

Pre-compiled binary versions are provided for various [[operating system]]s. Although R has a [[command line interface]], there are several [[graphical user interface]]s, such as [[RStudio]], an [[Integrated development environment]].
# R Journal

[[The R Journal]] is the [[open access]], [[Academic journal]] journal of the R project for statistical computing. It features short to medium length articles on the use, and development of R, including packages, programming tips, CRAN news, and foundation news - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R_(programming_language)#R_Journal wikipedia]
